name: Third Party Software/Technologies Used in EFS
title: Third Party Software/Technologies Used in EFS
body:
Table of Contents

  • Implementation
    • Ready-Made Components
    • Frontend Styling
    • Framework Decisions
    • Development Tools
    • Licensed Software

NOTE: This is list is not exhaustive.

Implementation

Major software, languages and runtimes used in our software.

  • PHP 7 (transitioning to 8)

  • Composer

  • Nginx

  • Lua (as custom code)

  • Python (in services)

  • NodeJS (various versions)

  • NPM (various versions)

 

Ready-Made Components

Ready-Made components we are using in our software:

  • MariaDB 10.2.25 (transitioning to 10.2.40)

  • NFS (AWS EFS)

  • Kafka (MSK)

  • Tyntec SMS

  • MongoDB (currently only App Gateway and in Development)

  • Aspose (mostly Datavoyager)

  • ElasticSearch

  • Druid (Analytics)

  • Alteryx (Tablau)

  • MemCached

  • RabbitMQ (e.g. DV and Emails)

  • FastBit (Datavoyager)

  • Tablau

  • Exasol (Tablau)

  • Hurricane MTA (Emails)

  • Postfix

Frontend Styling

  • SCSS/Sass

  • Tailwind CSS / Tailwind UI (licensed, Mostly Analytics)

Framework Decisions

  • CanJS

  • VueJS

  • ExpressJS

  • Jest

  • Zend/Laminas

  • Smarty

  • Twig

  • PHPUnit

Development Tools

  • Figma

  • LucidChart

  • PHPStorm - IntelliJ (licensed)

  • VSCode

  • Bitbucket

  • Concourse CI

  • Jenkins

  • Doxygen

 

Licensed Software

Software

Comment

Tableau

MySight

Aspose/Sharepoint

mostly Data Voyager/Report Manager

Tyntec SMS
